definition: just before the contest/on the eve of war
to face/to overlook/to arrive/to be (just) about to/just before

sentences.english: The theory of the crisis is the basic theory of the police being in the emergency theory.
sentences.chinese: 危機管理是警察臨戰學的理論基礎。

sentences.english: On the eve of the war, the two parties both made full preparations.
sentences.chinese: 臨戰前雙方都進行了充分的準備。

sentences.english: The studying of police stress facing battles is recognized widely in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 臨戰警察的應激能力正受到人們越來越廣泛的重視。

sentences.english: Besides, there were no generals available to command the battle that was about to begin.
sentences.chinese: 還有就是臨戰前沒有指揮作戰的將軍。
